main functions



C_CONSOLE_OUTPUT_FULL

#define C_CONSOLE_OUTPUT_FULL 0xffff
type: C preprocessor definition
description: mask to output all channels

C_LOG_FULL

#define C_LOG_FULL 0xffff
type: C preprocessor definition
description: mask to output

c_core_init

void c_core_init(uint console_output_mask, uint log_mask);
type: C function
description: initialize core module
start core timer
init output - set console output to print channels specified in console_output_mask
init log - log only channels specified with log_mask
init core memory - will depend on value of gc_core_memory_size

c_core_terminate

void c_core_terminate(void);
type: C function
description: terminate core module

c_sleep

void c_sleep(uint32 milliseconds);
type: C function
description: make current thread sleep

c_pause_program

void c_pause_program(void);
type: C function
description: waits for an input

CriticalSection

typedef CRITICAL_SECTION CriticalSection;
type: C typedef

c_critical_section_init

void c_critical_section_init(CriticalSection *critical_section);
type: C function
description: initialize a critical section

c_critical_section_delete

void c_critical_section_delete(CriticalSection *critical_section);
type: C function
description: delete a critical section

c_critical_section_enter

void c_critical_section_enter(CriticalSection *critical_section);
type: C function
description: enter a critical section

c_critical_section_leave

void c_critical_section_leave(CriticalSection *critical_section);
type: C function
description: leave a critical section
